metadata.synopsis: Dialog for gnome worker on the other side of the ebon lake after they were saved by player.
metadata.how_to_trigger: to trigger Greeting -1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3.  goto -626.84, 14.95, 316.494. Break down the wall (CTRL-Shift-K)5. Side with rebels.6. killcombat7. Go and take the boat back to the other side of the lake (goto -628.51, 0.30, 382.36)8. goto 84.75, 50.98, -94.759. talk to Welso.

0.speaker: Welso
0.text: You've done so much, I hate asking for more. But you see more slavers? Burn them, skin them - make them hurt.

1.speaker: Welso
1.text: You saved my skin, but there's more bastards out there. For every one you kill? Pint on me.

2.speaker: Welso
2.text: Whatever that thing is, it's not Thulla. She was the liveliest of us.
